items.summary: Generate an updated Maui Lane Care Home brand logo image and store it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, suitable for use in the app header.
Generate an updated Maui Lane Care Home application icon image and store it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, suitable for use as the browser favicon.

Apply the updated Maui Lane Care Home logo in the authenticated app header by updating the header logo image source in frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShell.tsx to use the newly generated logo asset.
Apply the updated application icon as the site favicon by updating frontend/index.html to reference the newly generated app icon asset.
